summary: A Colombian drugs cartel joins forces with a group of Hong Kong Triads and the hottest Hitman on the planet, to ship two tonnes of cocaine into Australia and China.
cast: Toby Barron|Byron J. Brochmann|Alex Castro|Pauline Egan|Jeronimo Garcia|Masson Ge|Nelson Grande|Nancy Ibarra|Shiga Lin|Chia-Hui Liu|Zheng Liu|Alana Lowes|Brad McMurray|Jason Neibling|Pitbull|Natisha Rai|Mario Vega|Jimmy Ga Lok Wong
keywords: shaolin kung fu|explosion|shot in the head|bloody violence|violence
title: Blood Money
